hero-standard.name: Standard Hero Section
hero-standard.description: Full viewport hero with background, headline, and CTA
hero-standard.codeStructure: Section with min-height 100vh, background image with overlay, centered content container, h1 headline, p subheadline, button group

hero-split.name: Split Hero Section
hero-split.description: Two-column hero with text and visual
hero-split.codeStructure: Flex container, left div (50-60%) with text content, right div (40-50%) with image/video/mockup

hero-minimal.name: Minimal Hero Section
hero-minimal.codeStructure: Centered container with large headline, brief subtext, single prominent CTA

social-proof-logos.name: Logo Cloud Section
social-proof-logos.codeStructure: Section with 'Trusted by' or 'As seen in' label, flex row of grayscale logos, hover to colorize

features-grid.name: Features Grid Section
features-grid.description: Grid of feature cards with icons
features-grid.codeStructure: Section with centered heading, CSS Grid of feature cards, each card has Lucide icon, h3 title, p description

features-alternating.name: Alternating Features Section
features-alternating.codeStructure: Stack of feature sections, odd: text-left image-right, even: image-left text-right, flex-direction row/row-reverse

features-large.name: Large Feature Showcase
features-large.description: Single feature highlighted with large visual
features-large.codeStructure: Section with heading, large screenshot/image, row of 3-4 feature points below

services-grid.name: Services Grid Section
services-grid.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of service cards, each with icon, title, description, optional link

services-detailed.name: Detailed Services Section
services-detailed.codeStructure: Two-column layout, each service has number (01, 02), title, full description, feature bullets

about-story.name: About/Story Section
about-story.codeStructure: Two-column: left has story paragraphs, right has pull quote and/or image

about-team.name: Team Section
about-team.description: Team member grid with photos and bios
about-team.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of team cards, each with photo, name, title, optional bio snippet, social icons

about-values.name: Values Section
about-values.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of value cards with icons, value names, brief descriptions

stats-row.name: Statistics Row Section
stats-row.codeStructure: Flex row with space-around, 3-4 stats, each has large number (animated counter), + or %, label below

stats-with-image.name: Stats with Background Image
stats-with-image.codeStructure: Section with background image, dark overlay, centered stats row

testimonials-carousel.name: Testimonials Carousel Section
testimonials-carousel.codeStructure: Section with optional heading, carousel showing one testimonial at a time, navigation dots/arrows

testimonials-grid.name: Testimonials Grid Section
testimonials-grid.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of testimonial cards, each with optional stars, quote, author info

testimonial-featured.name: Featured Testimonial Section
testimonial-featured.codeStructure: Centered section, large decorative quote mark, large italic quote, author name/title, optional company logo

pricing-cards.name: Pricing Cards Section
pricing-cards.codeStructure: Section heading, flex/grid row of pricing cards, featured tier highlighted, each has tier name, price, features with checks, CTA

pricing-comparison.name: Pricing Comparison Table
pricing-comparison.description: Feature comparison table for pricing tiers
pricing-comparison.codeStructure: Table with tiers as columns, features as rows, check/x marks for inclusion

cta-simple.name: Simple CTA Section
cta-simple.codeStructure: Full-width section with contrasting background, centered headline, brief subtext, prominent button

cta-split.name: Split CTA Section
cta-split.codeStructure: Two-column: left has headline and description, right has email form or CTA buttons

cta-banner.name: CTA Banner Section
cta-banner.codeStructure: Flex row with headline on left, button on right, accent background color

process-steps.name: Process Steps Section
process-steps.codeStructure: Section heading, horizontal row (vertical on mobile) of numbered steps, connecting lines between

how-it-works.name: How It Works Section
how-it-works.codeStructure: Section heading, row of 3-4 steps, each with icon, title, description

gallery-grid.name: Gallery Grid Section
gallery-grid.codeStructure: Section with optional heading, CSS grid of images, hover overlay, click to open lightbox

gallery-masonry.name: Masonry Gallery Section
gallery-masonry.codeStructure: CSS columns or masonry grid, varying height images, hover effects, lightbox

portfolio-grid.name: Portfolio Grid Section
portfolio-grid.codeStructure: Section heading, optional category filter tabs, grid of project cards with images and info

contact-split.name: Contact Split Section
contact-split.codeStructure: Two-column: left has contact form, right has contact info with icons, optional embedded map

contact-simple.name: Simple Contact Section
contact-simple.codeStructure: Centered section, heading, max-width form with fields and submit button

faq-accordion.name: FAQ Accordion Section
faq-accordion.codeStructure: Section heading, list of FAQ items, each with clickable question, expandable answer, Plus/Minus icon

faq-two-column.name: Two Column FAQ Section
faq-two-column.codeStructure: Section heading, two columns of FAQ items, can be accordion or always expanded

newsletter-simple.name: Newsletter Signup Section
newsletter-simple.codeStructure: Section with background color, centered content, headline, brief description, inline email input and submit

newsletter-with-image.name: Newsletter with Image Section
newsletter-with-image.codeStructure: Two-column: one side has image, other has newsletter content and form

location-map.name: Location/Map Section
location-map.codeStructure: Section with heading, address/hours/phone info, embedded Google Map or static map image

locations-multiple.name: Multiple Locations Section
locations-multiple.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of location cards, each with name, address, phone, hours, directions link

blog-preview.name: Blog Preview Section
blog-preview.codeStructure: Section heading, grid of 3 blog post cards, View All Blog link

events-upcoming.name: Upcoming Events Section
events-upcoming.codeStructure: Section heading, list/grid of event cards with date badges, titles, details, registration links

menu-restaurant.name: Restaurant Menu Section
menu-restaurant.codeStructure: Section heading, category tabs/filters, menu items with name, description, price, dietary indicators

schedule-classes.name: Class Schedule Section
schedule-classes.codeStructure: Section heading, table/grid showing days of week, time slots, class names

awards-credentials.name: Awards & Credentials Section
awards-credentials.codeStructure: Section with optional heading, row of certification badges, award logos, membership emblems

partners-integrations.name: Partners/Integrations Section
partners-integrations.codeStructure: Section heading like 'Our Partners' or 'Integrations', grid of partner/integration logos

footer-standard.name: Standard Footer
footer-standard.codeStructure: Full-width dark section, grid with logo/description, multiple link columns, social icons, bottom copyright bar

footer-simple.name: Simple Footer
footer-simple.codeStructure: Single row: logo left, horizontal nav links center, copyright right
